DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether accelerate partial breast irradiation ( APBI ) multi-catheter brachytherapy safe effective .
DOC.brief_title: Partial Breast Irradiation With Multi-Catheter Brachytherapy pT1-2pN0 Breast Cancer After Breast Conserving Surgery
DOC.criteria: pT1/2 ( ≤ 3 cm ) pN0 pN1 mi M0 contralateral BC Clear margin ( ≥ 2 mm ) Age ≥ 35 year ER and/or PR positive Multifocality Multicentricity EIC Lymphovascular invasion Poorly differentiate tumor Diffuse microcalcifications
